Los Angeles Contemporary Archive

  • Los Angeles Contemporary Archive
2025
Description

A new website years in the making. LACA is a public archive and library dedicated to contemporary art-making. They collaborate with artists to build archival collections, which include studio leases, contracts, paystubs, performance apparel, set pieces, police reports, text messages, class syllabi, and materials from formally running art spaces.

Collaborators

Hailey Loman, Saida Largaespada, Julian Stein

Role

Website Design

Other Credits

Built by Julian Stein and Max Stein
